name: Escape Jungle
description:
June the 15th, 1832, Heracles awake from his sleep at 9am, looked all directions. hope to find a member of his tribe, but in vane, no one was there.
In fact, all the members of his tribe have taken the road to the next forest since 5am.
So Heracles found himself alone in this jungle, he must take the same path of his tribe otherwise he will die.
